DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Effectiveness Safety Liraglutide Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Insufficiently control 3 month treatment OADs ( oral antidiabetic drug ) Previously treat liraglutide Hypersensitivity liraglutide excipients ( Disodium phosphate dihydrate , propylene glycol , phenol , water injection ) Pregnant , breast feeding intention become pregnant
